Previous DSA Events

Since 2015, DSA has held 9 events in 7 different African Countries including Ghana, Uganda, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya, Tanzania, and Ethiopia.
DSA Events consist of 3 days summer school (for training) and 2 days of workshop (for showcasing use cases)

Get started now

Previous DSA Events

Since 2015, DSA has held 9 events in 7 different African Countries including Ghana, Uganda, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya, Tanzania, and Ethiopia.
DSA Events consist of 3 days summer school (for training) and 2 days of workshop (for showcasing use cases)

Get started now

DSA Research
Grants

DSA grants to 10 projects based at African Universities covering 8 (eight) African countries including Benin, Egypt, Ethiopia, Kenya, Nigeria, South Africa, Tanzania, and Uganda. Covering areas oc COVID-19, Agriculture, Climatic change, Urban planning and Health.

Get started now

DSA Visiting
Fellowship

The DSA Visiting Fellowship presents exciting opportunities
for members of the DSA community to explore and deepen their
academic and professional interests through research visits to DSA
partner academic institutions.

Get started now

Local
chapters

DSA local chapters are meant to consolidate the achievements of
DSA at individual country level. DSA Uganda network is the first
local chapter and its mission is to be “an all-inclusive network of
data scientists, enthusiasts, and organisations inspired to grow
data science skills and their usage to contribute to Uganda's
development aspirations”.

Get started now

DSA Events

DSA Events consist of a 3 days of Summer School and 2 days of Workshop. We have had a total of 9 events in 7 countries in Africa.

9th
DSA 2021 Kimberley

Sol Plaatje University, Kimberley, South Africa

8th
DSA 2020 Kampala

Makerere University, Kampala, Uganda

7th
DSA 2019 Accra

Ashesi University, Accra, Ghana

6th
DSA 2019 Addis

Addis Ababa University, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

5th
DSA 2018 Abuja

African University of Science and Technology, Abuja, Nigeria

4th
DSA 2018 Nyeri

Dedan Kimathi University of Technology, Nyeri, Kenya

3rd
DSA 2017 Arusha

Nelson Mandela African Institute of Science and Technology, Tanzania

2nd
DSA 2016 Kampala

Makerere University, Kampala, Uganda

1st
DSA 2015 Nyeri

Dedan Kimathi University of Technology, Nyeri, Kenya

We are a young company always looking for new and creative ideas to help you with our products in your everyday work.
